title: Avast confirms it tagged Google app as malware on Android phones
description: Czech cybersecurity company Avast confirmed that its antivirus SDK has been flagging a Google Android app as malware on Huawei, Vivo, and Honor smartphones since Saturday. [...]

title: Flipper Zero Bluetooth spam attacks ported to new Android app
description: Recent Flipper Zero Bluetooth spam attacks have now been ported to an Android app, allowing a much larger number of devices to implement these annoying spam alerts. [...]

title: Windows 11 23H2 - New features in the Windows 11 2023 Update
description: Microsoft released the new Windows 11 23H2 feature update today, and it comes with a ton of new features that may make Windows 10 holdouts willing to upgrade. [...]

title: How to download a Windows 11 23H2 ISO from Microsoft
description: Microsoft released Windows 11 23H2, the Windows 11 2023 Update, today, and you can now download an ISO image for the new version to put aside for emergencies or clean installs. [...]

title: British Library knocked offline by weekend cyberattack
description: The British Library has been hit by a major IT outage affecting its website and many of its services following a "cyber incident" that impacted its systems on Saturday, October 28. [...]

title: Atlassian warns of critical Confluence flaw leading to data loss
description: Australian software company Atlassian warned admins to immediately patch Internet-exposed Confluence instances against a critical security flaw that could lead to data loss following successful exploitation. [...]

title: Microsoft releases Windows 11 23H2 as an enablement package
description: Microsoft announced today the release of Windows 11, version 23H2, the next feature update for its operating system (also known as the Windows 11 2023 Update). [...]

title: Dozens of countries will pledge to stop paying ransomware gangs
description: An alliance of 40 countries will sign a pledge during the third annual International Counter-Ransomware Initiative summit in Washington, D.C., to stop paying ransoms demanded by cybercriminal groups. [...]

title: Samsung Galaxy gets new Auto Blocker anti-malware feature
description: Samsung has unveiled a new security feature called 'Auto Blocker' as part of the One UI 6 update, offering enhanced malware protection on Galaxy devices. [...]

title: Massive cybercrime URL shortening service uncovered via DNS data
description: A threat actor that security researchers call Prolific Puma has been providing link shortening services to cybercriminals for at least four years while keeping a sufficiently low profile to operate undetected. [...]

title: Canada bans WeChat and Kaspersky products on govt devices
description: Canada has banned the use of Kaspersky security products and Tencent's WeChat app on mobile devices used by government employees, citing network and national security concerns. [...]

title: Malicious NuGet packages abuse MSBuild to install malware
description: A new NuGet typosquatting campaign pushes malicious packages that abuse Visual Studio's MSBuild integration to execute code and install malware stealthily. [...]

title: Exploit released for critical Cisco IOS XE flaw, many hosts still hacked
description: Public exploit code is now available for the critical Cisco IOS XE vulnerability tracked as CVE-2023-20198 that was leveraged as a zero-day to hack tens of thousands of devices. [...]
